root: ^My sister wants me to try to get her a job at my office but she isn’t really qualified.
^Tell her she isn’t qualified but I know of another job she would be good for
^Tell my boss she isn’t qualified but ask if %Pron:1:1% will interview her as a favor

res1: ^My sister gets annoyed with me. I feel badly and end up staying at work late to work overtime because I don’t feel like going home.

^I guess I shouldn’t have been so blunt with my sister, but she isn’t qualified I didn’t want to give her resume to my boss! Anyway, I stayed late tonight and got on my boss’s good side. That’s not bad.
res2: ^My sister is thankful for my honesty and that I want to help her and she takes me out to dinner as a thank you.
^My sister was happy with my honesty and I am definitely going to try to land her a different job. She took me out to dinner and we had a fantastic time!
res3: ^My sister is thankful but my boss is annoyed at me for wasting %Pron:1:3% time. I work overtime to try to make it up to my boss.
^My sister is appreciative of me trying but my boss is annoyed I wasted %Pron:1:3% time. Here I go working overtime to try to get back on %Pron:1:3% good side!
res4: ^My boss doesn’t mind and does the interview but my sister finds out that I said she wasn’t qualified and gets angry with me.
^It was really nice of my boss to do all of this for me, we definitely got closer. But I don’t know how my sister found out but she is so angry with me! Jeez, I was trying to spare her feelings!
